name: Hellivator
description:
Power your elevator with Energium to progress deeper and deeper into the earth. Get to hell, and you can mine a near limitless supply of Satanite and get rich! Each level has different ores to mine, enabling you to upgrade your gear in the elevator. Use your pick, gun, kicks, and suit to stock up on resources as you get closer and closer to the devil’s domain!
